title: Miniature Rooms at the Art Institute of Chicago Postcard Book
description:
This book of 31 postcards showcases the Art Institute’s beloved Thorne Rooms, which have delighted visitors for generations. Designed by Chicago artist Narcissa Niblack Thorne, the breathtaking details of these miniature interiors belie their diminutive scale, inviting viewers to step into an idealized past.

  • Dimensions: 6.5 x 4.75 in.
  • 31 postcards
